Label.en: Many locals who had hated the sight of the locks thought this was even worse!
Label.fr: Beaucoup de riverains (allergiques à la vue des cadenas) ont trouvé cela encore pire !
Label.es: Many locals who had hated the sight of the locks thought this was even worse!
Label.zh: Many locals who had hated the sight of the locks thought this was even worse!

Label.en: But I guess you can’t silence the power of love!
Label.fr: J'imagine que rien n'arrête les forces combinées de l'amour et du kitch
Label.es: But I guess you can’t silence the power of love!
Label.zh: But I guess you can’t silence the power of love!

Label.en: So, who's side are you on in this battle?
Label.fr: De quel côté es-tu dans cette bataille ?
Label.es: So, who's side are you on in this battle?
Label.zh: So, who's side are you on in this battle?

Label.en: Regardless, the bridge is still visited by thousands of romantic tourists every year, thanks to it’s pretty views and ambience
Label.fr: En tous cas, le pont est toujours parcouru par de nombreux couples tous les ans, en raison de ses jolies vues et de son ambiance
Label.es: Regardless, the bridge is still visited by thousands of romantic tourists every year, thanks to it’s pretty views and ambience
Label.zh: Regardless, the bridge is still visited by thousands of romantic tourists every year, thanks to it’s pretty views and ambience
